changeSet.author: tdiler
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `JTPD`.`STUDENT` ( `ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `FIRSTNAME` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `LASTNAME` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `AGE` INT, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )

changeSet.author: tdiler
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `JTPD`.`TEACHER` ( `ID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `FIRSTNAME` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `LASTNAME` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) )
